程序包 org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.http

Auto-configuration for HTTP concerns.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    HttpEncodingProperties
    Configuration properties for http encoding.
    HttpMessageConverters
    Bean used to manage the HttpMessageConverters used in a Spring Boot application.
    HttpMessageConvertersAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for HttpMessageConverters.
    HttpMessageConvertersAutoConfiguration.StringHttpMessageConverterConfiguration
